title: A brief review on flue gas desulfurization gypsum recovery toward calcium carbonate preparation

The past several years has witnessed great progress in utilization of industrial waste gypsum. Newly developed carbonation technology toward CaCO3 preparation also reveal a significant utilization way to recovery high-value...
